post.author: stevenkim
post.content:
Urgently,

1. Looking for a Computer Operator in UNISYS environment.

2. Fulltime position.

3. 4 PM - Midnight Shift.

4. Etobicoke area.

5. Communication is less emphasized due to the nature of the job.

6. Send Resume to 'saewhankim@hanmail.net' ASAP if you are qualified.
post.title: Computer Operator. UNISYS Hardware
